item.title: Instant Pot Pinto Beans
item.description: Notes This one takes around an 1:30 to cook and release the pressue. Plan ahead! Ingredients 1 pound dry pinto beans 5 1/2 cups water 1 2/3 Tablespoon Better Than Bullion vegetable base salt and pepper to taste (Honestly, mine didn’t need any. The BTB flavored them perfectly. Taste them first.) Instructions Rinse off your pinto beans, and drain them using a wire mesh strainer. Add them to the Instant Pot, along with the water and Better Than Bullion vegetable base.
